summary.subject: Call for Letter of Interest (LoI) to organize the European conference on Software Architecture (ECSA)

conference.name: ECSA
conference.description: Premier European conference on Software Architecture focusing on advances and breakthroughs in the field.
conference.ranking: A CORE conference rank since 2010, top ranked according to CORE2023.

call_for_interest.purpose: To invite submissions for Letters of Interest to organize ECSA in September 2027 and onwards.

general_chair.details_required: Name and short CV, including experience on organizing international conferences.

location.details_required: General presentation of the potential venue and the city.

supporting_organizations.details_required: Preliminary list of supporting organizations from academia, research institutions, industry.

potential_program_chair.details: An initial list of names for potential Program Chair(s) and other Organizing Committee members.

submission_details.procedure: Send application by email to SC chair, Paris Avgeriou.

summary.conference_history: ECSA has been held yearly in Europe since 2007, with various locations each year.
summary.funding: ECSA is self-funded through registration fees and sponsors.

steering_committee.role: Fosters and selects proposals for organizing ECSA.
